website_summaries.verdict: The larger containers are a great money saver if your favorite amphibian enjoys the taste, but the real value is in Wardley’s floating pellet form, perfect balance of vitamins and minerals, and meaty ingredients.
pros: Fish meal, ground corn, soybean meal, chicken by-product meal, corn meal, and fish oil are the first 6 ingredients
Fortified with vitamin C and calcium
cons: Contains corn and soy amphibians don’t need
A general turtle, frog, and newt food

customer_reviews.title: 45 Year Old Turtle Loves His Wardley Reptile Sticks
customer_reviews.text: My red-eared slider who has been with me for 45 years will only eat one kind of food stick which is the Wardley Reptile Sticks. There have been times when I ran out of Wardley sticks and could not find a store that carried them so tried another popular brand, and he would not touch them. Since my little green friend has lived well beyond his expected lifespan and has been with me through every important event in my life I think he deserves to always have the food of his choice. I'm grateful to have found Wardley food sticks on Amazon and have added them to my Subscribe & Save account, so we never run out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cope

customer_reviews.title: My red eared slide goes bonkers over this food.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as he sees me approach his tank he jumps in the water and waits, and after I'm done feeding him he digs around in the stone substrate looking for pieces he missed and scraps like a crackhead searching the floor for that rock they swear they dropped. He's about 7" shell length and almost always swallows them whole so there is little waste and little residue, so it helps to keep the clean tank in that way. Although it's pretty cool when he catches one in the side of his mouth and it sticks out like a cigar before he crunches down on it and it snaps.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyOC

customer_reviews.title: Turtle LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews that said their turtles loved this food. It's true. Our turtle is 29 years old now and we try to vary his diet for all the obvious reasons. However, there are many foods he just won't eat. As soon as I introduced this food to him, he attacked it like he hadn't eaten in a month! Note that the sticks are very small - ideal for little turtles but ours is now about 10" in diameter so had to give him a bunch of sticks -- not a problem though
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Happy Turtles and Happy Wallet
customer_reviews.text: In love with Wadley! I have two Red Ear Sliders and two Snappers. They absolutely love this stuff. One of the best things is that it doesn't dissolve in just a few seconds like the other brands I have tried. the turtles actually have a chance to eat it and it doesn't become just more junk at the bottom. I was buying this at the local grocery store and paying a little over $5 for 4oz so I am also saving tons of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Mother of five turtles giving rave reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to for my turtles. They float and do not junk up the water. It gives the turtle plenty of time to eat. I do however turn up the pump a little because it stirs the pellets and they enjoy racing after them!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps one of the longest turtles in captivity?  She has loved this her whole life!
customer_reviews.text: The important thing is that this is the ONLY food our turtle likes! She has been eatting it now for almost 30 years!! Yes, 30 years! And still loves it every day.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: My turtles love this
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this. I switched from another brand and they seem happier and healthier with more of an appetite. And it's half the price I was paying for their old food.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: My turtles seem to love this. They still prefer being hand-fed (because they accidentally kick away floating food when they swim), but they will happily go after pieces if I drop them in and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kim

customer_reviews.title: For the turtle enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I have two aquatic turtles. They eat a lot, as growing turtles should. These big containers are the best value to quantity I can find. Don't just feed them these though! Remember to give them the occasional treat. Mine prefer crickets and grasshoppers from the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tribal

customer_reviews.title: My turtle's favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: A great product and a good price. My only complaint is the lid breaks about halfway through the can. I've put them in a different container with a screw on lid.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Box turtle prefers these over all other turtle foods
customer_reviews.text: Our female box turtle will only eat Wardley ReptiSticks pellets. Refuses all other pellet food or treats from the store. She also likes fresh foods like cucumber, lettuce, strawberry and corn-on-the-cob. Thank you Wardley for carrying a fantastic food such as this.
customer_reviews.author: STRAWBERRY SHORTCAKE

customer_reviews.title: My turtles, Low Low & Sparky seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay, only because it breaks down a bit too rapidly which leaves a ton of residue in the bottom of my 1 gallon aquarium I use solely for feeding, however. If you are usually used to feeding in the actual 10-20 gal aquariums I truly do not recommend this, only because there will be a ton of residue left within the aquarium, even with a filter. Over all the turtles like this treat much more than the tetra reptile sticks which didn't break down at all. So yeah, just a heads up on the break down of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Works for my Turtle
customer_reviews.text: My Turtles loves it. The only downside is that it gives the stronger bad smell of water than that of Tetra brand's sticks.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves these better than the green Tetramin floating sticks. He's happy, I'm happy. Very good price for this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great priced alternative
customer_reviews.text: I've been way overspending on turtle food. This is way more reasonably priced and my turtle seems to love it.
customer_reviews.author: The Village Idiot

customer_reviews.title: My box turtles love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years. My exotic vet highly recommended that I feed to my box turtles. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: ChicaDesi

customer_reviews.title: Turned the water green
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loved these pellets. Unfortunately they turned the water green & I am forced to change the water more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper...

customer_reviews.title: Great turtle food
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic - your turtle either likes these or not. Ours won't eat anything else. He's hard-headed that way - lol.
customer_reviews.author: SuzB

customer_reviews.title: Turtles Food
customer_reviews.text: Great price, Fast shipping, Turtles like food. I was asked where do you find exp date it's on bottem of can.
customer_reviews.author: allenyk2000

customer_reviews.title: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: awesome deal, loads of food for the turtle and the cichlids like it too. Only a little stinky when you open the container.
customer_reviews.author: Bia

customer_reviews.title: Very Economical!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to see this product available in this size and such a fantastic price. Since my turtles are about 10 years old and have been eating this all along, they are still very happy! When they are not in hibernation, which is during the late spring and summer months, they eat a lot! and this is very economical. They just wait for me to shake the can and line up for their food. Will be reordering from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Value and great product
customer_reviews.text: My Shelley liked this food I tried other brands and he would not eat them but she tried this one and loved it
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is great. I bought it for my nephew and his turtle liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Broswick Family

customer_reviews.title: Monthly customer very happy too
customer_reviews.text: Great value and I receive it every month without fail this is worth the price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Wardley floating sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the size. I usually get these for my turtles. Walmart sales the small can for the same price as I paid for this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy turtle
customer_reviews.text: Our turtle loves this food. I didn’t realize the container was as big as it is so Sheldon will be all set with food for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: k fig

customer_reviews.title: Only turtle food!!
customer_reviews.text: Only pellet brand my turtle eats, ive tried others & no bite, thanks for exisiting lol

customer_reviews.title: Turtle do not eat
customer_reviews.text: Turtle hate them . Would not eat . I went the amazon route but had to go back to get other one from store . Must be ingredients
customer_reviews.author: p stewart

customer_reviews.title: Soak the food in water for a couple of minutes if you are using it for a land turtle.
customer_reviews.text: Even though this food is for water turtles I have been giving it to our box turtle for 25 years.
customer_reviews.author: PokerCarol

customer_reviews.title: Turtle loves
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves these. The only food he will eat.
customer_reviews.author: harris

customer_reviews.title: Kept my turtle alive for 35 years so far.
customer_reviews.text: They taste pretty good I good Ive had better snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shy usually
customer_reviews.text: I have a red-eared slider turtle. He lives in a small pond in our backyard. Pretty shy usually, but comes up to eat and really chows down. Love the large size container, as just a few pieces won't work in such a large surface.
customer_reviews.author: powderpuff

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: My turtle loves this food that I couldn't find at my local store where I used to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with these! I love how they have calcium which is very important for the turtles diet. My 1 year Eastern River Cooter and my hatchling Eastern Painted Slider absolutely love these! It would be awesome if they came in a smaller size though. It's a bit big for a hatchling to swallow. Other than that I recommend these sticks 100%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gurguis

customer_reviews.title: not for human consumption
customer_reviews.text: I asked my turtles to review it, “...extremely delicious...hints of crickets and sh*t...”
customer_reviews.author: SnoWhite

customer_reviews.title: Best turtle food
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 baby turtles (barely two months old). I have tried just about every type of turtle food you can imagine - and this food is their FAVORITE. Oh course they would rather have live crickets to eat, but I only do that once every 1-2 weeks. For their regular meals, they eat Wardley!!!
customer_reviews.author: 2LittleGirlsTx

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way I will buy turtle food again.. Received it quickly and the container is huge compared to the ones at the local stores.. Our turtle is 20 years old and this is all he has lived on and is doing great.. before this can runs out - which will be a while -- I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: 4k's

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love these! Great buy for the money. Was paying way more at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: SiLola M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby box turtles!
customer_reviews.text: They work really well to feed baby box turtles. I soak them for a couple of minutes and then leave them out on the ground for the babies to eat. They eat them first thing every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turtles Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have three Red Eared Sliders. I have tried different brands but they like this brand the best. I like purchasing the large container because it lasts for months. This is the only food I give them. I tried the shrimp but it just ended up in the filter as they did not eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mitlitsky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cloud the water quite as much as other products
customer_reviews.text: As far as turtle food, most of them turn the water green and make it smell nasty if the turtle doesn't eat absolutely every piece. I took the advice of a fellow turtle owner who let me know that this product is quite a bit better on that account and found him to be correct. The "sticks" are easy for any of my 4 turtles to grab and appetizing enough that they are excited to see the can. It also comes in a nice large size and is affordable. I'm not aware on the benefits of this product nutritional value-wise, but on other elements it's definitely the best food I've fed my turtles.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brue

customer_reviews.title: My turtles won't eat anything else
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this product. We've tried other foods and they will have none of it. I subscribe and get a container auto shipped to me every other month for half the price I was paying at my local pet store. I will never buy any tuning else.
customer_reviews.author: elyse rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Wardley sticks
customer_reviews.text: My turtle will only eat these pellets literally. Tried others and he does not like them and won't eat them. Good brand. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great for water rturtles!
customer_reviews.text: Great product & hard to get. My things appreciate this product over Reptomin, they don't like Reptomin.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: My red eared slider loves them!
customer_reviews.text: She's been eating them for twenty years now and is doing great.

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love this food. Great price for the size of container.

customer_reviews.title: Wardley's is one of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is great food, the only one my two water turtles will eat and it is made in the USA which is a big pluse. Wardley is an old name and great product

customer_reviews.title: Don't laugh our Turtles prefer this brand
customer_reviews.text: Our turtles Favorite food, we've tried others they definately prefer Wardley

customer_reviews.title: My box turtle's favorite
customer_reviews.text: There are only 3 hard foods that my box turtle will eat. This is one of her favorites.

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: well worth what I pay. makes me not make so many trips to Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: amber pennington

customer_reviews.title: Easy snack on the go!
customer_reviews.text: My little turtle dude loves these. I use these to supplement his diet of dried fruits and veggies, but it seems like these are his favorite. They are easy to prepare and cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Brady & Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Turtles love them. Both large and small turtles. They are easy to break in half also.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castro

customer_reviews.title: ... will eat and it does contain calcium which is perfect for their shells
customer_reviews.text: This is the only floating stick my turtles will eat and it does contain calcium which is perfect for their shells.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL S. BERMAN

customer_reviews.title: good turtle food
customer_reviews.text: product was here quick, it is thinner sticks than other ones I bought but they are good for my smaller turtles too. They 3 turtles I have enjoy these sticks. They are also easy to store and to feed.

customer_reviews.title: my daughters turtle hates these but loved the ols style
customer_reviews.text: they changed the product some how my daughters turtle hates them and they were the same brand we purchased before not a good buy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This food has kept my aquatic frog alive for 20+ years.

customer_reviews.title: a favorite of the turtles!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Red Ear Slider turtles are fussy and they love Wardley reptile sticks as part of their diet. I've tried other brands and they refuse to eat it. Great value!

customer_reviews.text: My turtle Speedy is 15 this year and he has been eating this product from the begining, only kind he likes and he is still growing and with us today!!

customer_reviews.title: My Turtles love Wardley!
customer_reviews.text: Great Food my Turtles love this food it keeps them very happy and keeps them healthy

customer_reviews.title: Good for my turtle for years!
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding these to my painted turtle for over ten years, he appears to be very happy & healthy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Yumy Turtle Sticks for my tortoise
customer_reviews.text: My Sulcata Tortoise loves Turtle Sticks. A good food to have on hand when I'm low on fresh food for him.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Happy red ear slider
customer_reviews.text: Came from using reptomin and was looking for a cheaper alternative and came upon this product. I gotta admit that at first my turtle was also skeptical but now he loves this stuff and so do his tank mates. I highly recomend this product for it's price and it's quality. Amazon did an amazing job shipping this to me as fast as possible, class A service.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This food is what my turtles love. My turtles just wouldn't eat ReptoMin.

customer_reviews.title: My turtle loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my turtle will eat. Thank you Amazon for being so reasonably priced!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Marley

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the amazing service - we are really thrilled
customer_reviews.text: We have an Australian eastern side neck Turtle - he has been a member of our family for 25 years and is very fussy with his food. Thank you for the amazing service - we are really thrilled. this product is not easily available in australia so I am glad you could help us.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot find this product at the pet store anymore and my land turtle only likes this one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nakashima

customer_reviews.title: Turtle food
customer_reviews.text: Our turtle, Terrence, has only ever eaten Wardley reptile sticks. When our local Walmart ran out I bought an alternative make. He would not eat it!. I gave it four days and was beginning to panic when I looked on Amazon. I was able to purchase on line and have it delivered to my door. It does not get any better!
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: I thought it's just a small version of the 14.5 oz one
customer_reviews.text: However I am totally wrong. First it lacks of the sea foods aroma that the 14.5 oz can has. Second, it sinks to the bottom of water quickly. My turtles eat only floating food.
customer_reviews.author: TAORFA

customer_reviews.title: Wardley Reptile  Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed with my order this time. I order my turlte food thru amazon always, but this time, so far two of the cans that i have opened are full only half ways (missing the other half). I have never had a problem before so i am pretty upset.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: since this brand is the only brand they have been eating, did not want to switch since they were doing well with it. Also this was a super bargain compared to other dealers. It was also super fast shipping. thanks
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: proof is in the growth
customer_reviews.text: I've had my turtles (red-eared sliders) for over 10 years, and I've fed them almost exclusively Wardley reptile sticks (with a few table scraps -- Romaine lettuce, tunafish). My critters have grown steadily, and are active and healthy. You can't ask more than that from a pet food.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are what I'd expect for turtle food. I wish I didn't have to buy such a big size to make it worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: turtle loves it
customer_reviews.text: product comes fast ships well I only wish you could get product in larger quantities my turtle refuses any other brand so I will continue with this product anyway.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth macteer

customer_reviews.title: general opinion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I've used it for 15+ years. The product used to be available in appx. 2.5 pound boxes, because it was not readily available in that size I purchased a competitors brand more often. The vendor and service were great. The shipment arrived on time and in a clean box unlike some of the other vendors who don't take much care in how the appearance of the product is once the shipping carton is opened.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Reptile Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and was actually a much better price than at any store near me. I probably would have paid at least double the price to buy this size at the store.

customer_reviews.title: red ear slider
customer_reviews.text: Take some time for shipment . But is my red ear slider favorite and water crest

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: Turtles love this stuff. I have been feeding this stuff to my turtles for over 10 years. They very bigger every year.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only turtle food that my red ear will eat! Great product so I try to buy it in bulk when I can.

customer_reviews.title: Food sinks and makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: Food Sinks and collects at bottom and partially disintegrates...Makes a mess. turtles didn't like it much either. Filter can't process the big chunks until it really breaks apart. I was disappointed and cancelled my regular subscription
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Wibbelman

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my two baby yellow bellied sliders. i thought the tetra reptomin sticks were too expensive but boy was i wrong. when the turtles see the sticks they charge at them but then they turn away after they smell them. the sticks sink to the bottom and dirty up the tank. do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: f.noone

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my turtle favorite food, she loves these sticks. She eats the other brand, but loves these. I bought 3 cans to stock up, second time purchasing from them!! 😊😊👍👍🐢🐢

customer_reviews.title: Great price, large container
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with the size of the container. It is huge. I have never seen this size at any pet store or local supermarkets and the price is incredible. You won't be disappointed. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Wardley Premium Amphibian and Reptile Sticks
product_meta.description: Size:14.5 ozThis nutritionally balanced floating stick is ideal for all aquatic reptiles (e.g. turtles) and amphibians (e.g. frogs, newts). It is formulated with Calcium for healthy bones and Vitamin C for a healthy immune system.
feature_bullets: Ideal for all aquatic reptiles and amphibians, including turtles, frogs and newts
Includes 14.5 ounces of premium floating stix
Contains Vitamin C and Calcium to support strong immune systems, healthy bones, and shell growth in turtles
Contains no artificial colors or dyes that can harm reptiles or cloud water
